Text:
sorry - this is a duplicate. use the active one
http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3412063/HIV___AIDS_-_Fact_Or_Fraud__(1996)
this was rubbish 12 years ago now it is just stupid

easy to answer based on what argument? i understand how stupid people are also some of the most insulting types of people around. they become heated in a short time, but their passion burns away long before the really serious ones are finished debating anything.

this film makes a very strong argument for a revision of the aids/hiv question.

i bet the insulting people also deny there was a holocaust in 1948-9 in palestine, yet they will jail me for asking how many jews were killed by the nazi's.

funny how it's illegal to study the facts behind one holocaust, and illegal to even mention another one.

the active torrent is still going strong and the debate rages on, though many professionals don't do it openly for fear of losing their status and quite frankly, their licenses to practice medicine. the same goes for the homosexual debate. in the end, the real victims are those who suffer from such politicised illnesses.
